code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import Register from'./Register';import{createAPI,MapAPI}from"../../api/index";import{toast}from"react-toastify";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var MainRegister=function MainRegister(){var AddUser=function AddUser(FormUser,resetForm){if(FormUser.get('idKhach')==0)createAPI(MapAPI.USERACCOUNT+"/SignUpUser").create(FormUser).then(function(res){toast.success("T\u1EA1o t\xE0i kho\u1EA3n th\xE0nh c\xF4ng",{position:"top-right"});console.log("data: ",res.data);localStorage.setItem('info_user',JSON.stringify(res.data));}).catch(function(err){return console.log(err);});resetForm();};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"user-register blog",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"main-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"wrap-banner"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{id:"wrapper-site",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"container",style:{maxWidth:'95%',margin:'0 auto',marginTop:'80px'},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"row",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{id:"content-wrapper",className:"col-xs-12 col-sm-12 col-md-12 col-lg-12 onecol",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{id:"main",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{id:"content",className:"page-content",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"register-form text-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-center title-page",children:"T\u1EA1o t\xE0i kho\u1EA3n"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Register,{AddUser:AddUser})]})})})})})})})]})});};export default MainRegister;
